remarks: Lemma involving absolute value of differences.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-1999.)
statement:
absvalsqi.1 $e |- A e. CC $.
abssub.2 $e |- B e. CC $.
abs3dif.3 $e |- C e. CC $.
abs3lem.4 $e |- D e. RR $.
abs3lemi $p |- ( ( ( abs ` ( A - C ) ) < ( D / 2 ) /\ ( abs ` ( C - B ) ) < ( D / 2 ) ) -> ( abs ` ( A - B ) ) < D ) $.
